name: Dual Pouffe - Leather
description:
Introducing the Dual Pouffe – a harmonious blend of design and comfort. This compact footstool features a rounded upholstered plinth and a soft cylinder form. Upholstered in a single fabric, the versatile piece is designed to be incorporated into multiple schemes and moved throughout the home.
Fashioned from luxurious grained leather, a buttery soft forever fabric. The tan tonal brown leather brings a timeless appeal and a tactile richness to your interior. A functional accent piece, the Dual Pouffe serves multiple functions seamlessly transitioning from a convenient seat for unexpected guests to a chic dressing table stool or a luxurious footstool. Made in England.
